project1.title: Pet Adoption
project1.description: This is a page that displays a pet adoption agency's available pets in a grid of cards. There are buttons at the top of the page that allow the user to filter the pets according to type, or to show all of them.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Temperature Converter
project2.description: This app allows a user to convert temperatures from degrees Fahrenheit to degrees Celsius or vice versa.  The result of the conversion is displayed in a box at the bottom of the page and is color coded according to whether it is a hot, cold or middling temperature.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Solar System
project3.description: This app shows cards with the names of the planets in the solar system. When the user moves the mouse over a card, the name is replaced by a picture of the planet. Clicking on the picture brings up a larger card which includes both picture and name and adds a description of the planet underneath. The user may click a red X in the upper right hand corner to return to the main view.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Webpack
